title: How to Get Free Tickets at Chuck E. Cheese

steps.headline: Look around and see if some tickets were not pulled out from a game.
If there are not any, wait until an employee tests the machines.
Search the floor for dropped tickets.
Kindly ask others if they have any spare tickets.
steps.description: Most likely they will not, but it never hurts to ask.

steps.headline: Before you go to Chuck E Cheese, there is an online game at chuckecheese.com that lets you win up to 50 free tickets each time.
steps.description: An easy way to earn tickets - without even paying!

steps.headline: Download and play mobile games like Chuck E Cheese's Skate Universe and Chuck E Cheese's Party Galaxy.
steps.description: You can win up to 1000 tickets on each game!

steps.headline: Watch out for the Ticket Splash.
steps.description: Every hour on the 30, Chuck E. will come out and throw tickets.

text: Look around and see if some tickets were not pulled out from a game.  If there are not any, wait until an employee tests the machines. Pull the tickets you find. Search the floor for dropped tickets.  Look near the ticket "eater".  Kindly ask others if they have any spare tickets. Most likely they will not, but it never hurts to ask. Before you go to Chuck E Cheese, there is an online game at chuckecheese.com that lets you win up to 50 free tickets each time. An easy way to earn tickets - without even paying! Download and play mobile games like Chuck E Cheese's Skate Universe and Chuck E Cheese's Party Galaxy. You can win up to 1000 tickets on each game! Watch out for the Ticket Splash. Every hour on the 30, Chuck E. will come out and throw tickets.
